short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show you the number of tags.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The "Howmany" Chrome extension is designed to display the number of elements within the <body> of any webpage, offering a straightforward tool for users to quickly understand the page's structure.
